text: Born on 1987 to Mr. Sivadasan Narayanan and Mrs. Sailaja Kesavan, in Kadakkavur, a small village in the state of Kerala, India.

• Did my elementary education at C.S.I.E.M.H.S Attingal.
  • Completed Secondary education from Christ Nagar, Kaudiar
In May 2007, we moved to our dream home in Trivandrum, Kerala.
Completed my Bachelors degree from Marian Engineering College.
In April 2010, I started my career as an Enginerring trainee at Network Systems and Technologies, Trivandrum.
My current company got aquired by a technology giant Quest Global Corporation and I started my career at Quest Global.
Moved to the United States as part of work. Started supporting client GE Healthcare in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin.

• Joined BJs Wholesale Club as Senior Application Developer.
  • Met my better half Archana on December 2019.
2020 was a special year for me. I married Archana on March 15, 2020.
In 2021, as my visa got expired, moved to India from the United States.
In May 2022, did my dream vacation to Europe with my wife and our parent.

• My visa got renewed and moved back to the United States with my wife on February 2023.
  • In September 2023, started MS in Computer Science at Boston University.
